1938
Who are we?
About us
Moo-D is a game development company dedicated to crafting engaging and educational experiences for adults with cognitive disabilities. Our team of passionate designers, developers, and educators collaborates to produce high-quality games that seamlessly blend entertainment with learning.
Our Mission
1959
Universidade
Our mission is to empower individuals with disabilities by providing engaging and educational tools that enhance their money management skills. Through our board and digital games, we aim to create inclusive learning experiences that prepare players for real-world scenarios, ultimately fostering greater independence and readiness for employment opportunities, such as those at Café Inclusão.
1965
Our Vision
Ingresso na Sonae
We envision a world where individuals with disabilities have equal opportunities to develop essential life skills and achieve financial independence. By leveraging the power of interactive learning, we aspire to break down barriers to employment and inclusion, ensuring that every individual can confidently navigate daily financial tasks and contribute meaningfully to society.
Our Values
1974
Assunção do controlo da Sonae
Inclusion: We are committed to creating games that are accessible and beneficial to all players, regardless of their abilities.
Empowerment: Our games are designed to build confidence and skills that enable individuals to achieve greater independence.
Education: We prioritize educational content that is practical, engaging, and relevant to real-world scenarios.
1985
Our Goals
Expansão
Our primary goal is to provide tools that help players develop and master money management skills, including counting money and giving change. We aim to equip players with the necessary skills to perform cashier roles, specifically preparing them for employment opportunities at Café Inclusão.
